title: Renyu Ruqin
synopsis: Since ancient times, there have been constant wars between humans and mermaid. Mermaid feed on humans, and humans covet the treasures of the mermaid clan. Humans dominate the mainland, and mermaids own the sea. But because the mermaid can't leave the sea, they can't always win the final victory until one day...  (translated from baidu)

title: Ling Shi Mao Xian Wang
synopsis: There is a magical planet named "Lingshi City" in the distant universe. The energy on the planet comes from seven gems. The residents of the city live happily here. One day, the great devil Dafos took away the Philosopher's Stone from Lingshi City, and the city fell into crisis. The clock tower in the city center began to count down 500 days. If the Philosopher's Stone is not retrieved within 500 days, the city will be destroyed! For the peace of the city, Lei Hao, Sa Sa, Da Mao, Tao Tao, etc. traveled through Lingshi City, Dinosaur World and Sky City, and started a thrilling "Mao" adventure with Dafos, Lingshi City. Is it possible to return to peace, and what will happen to the fate of the Philosopher’s Stone and everyone? Please watch "Lingshi Mao Insurance King".  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhenbao Dang An
synopsis: The Crazy One Hundred Thousand Animation series is different from the traditional one hundred thousand whys. It adopts a humorous way of expression, giving popular science knowledge a fresh face and vitality. Its content is all-encompassing and full of wit, which can satisfy children's desire for knowledge and feel the learning. happy. (translated from qq)

title: Shengxiao Baobei
synopsis: "Baby Zodiac" is the first animation produced by Ningbo Yikun Digital Technology Co., Ltd., directed by Jiang Bin and Zhao Qifan, and written by Zheng Chengfeng, Yu Ang and Liu Fei. The film mainly tells the story of a pair of ordinary sisters and brothers on the earth after they traveled through the time and space tunnel to the planet of Liufu, find the Liufu stars together and defeated Sombra to save the earth and the planet of Liufu. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ling Huan Shidi
synopsis: The time background of "Linghuan Junior Brother" is located in a small town during the Republic of China. In the dream of Uncle Hua's junior brother, he told him that a disaster is coming in Wanfu Town. When he still didn't know the reason, strange things in this small town followed. Awen, Awu, and his master Uncle Hua skillfully dealt with and displayed their abilities, and kept the people in danger in danger.  (translated from baidu)

title: Shin Gengou Nyankogelion
synopsis: Promotional music video for the Battle Cats x Evangelion event.

details.Japanese: 新元号にゃんこゲリオン

title: Ghana Gift-hen
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Hai, Gu De Bai
synopsis: The story revolves around the trivial incidents of the lively and lovely 5-year-old boy Gu Debai's family. A family of three lives in a small snail house in Tianchen Community. The house is not big, but full of love, and many small jokes are made every day. Every day I hear my mother's roar of Gu Debai getting up, and my father's tone of voice practice. Gu Debai murmured. These sounds are intertwined and floated out from this small dwelling, depicting a rainbow over the city. Although the Gu Debai family is not rich, they bravely face life and love life. Perhaps life brings them many realities and unsatisfactory, but they use their own way to interpret, relieve the pressure brought by life, happy themselves, and entertain others , Send joy to those around you. Gu Debai is a child with his own innocent world. He uses his childlike words to describe the market, but with unique insights, people can't help but laugh. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Hai, Gu De Bai Zhi Ai Zui Zhengui
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Hai, Gu De Bai Zhi Shuqi Qushi

title: Hai, Gu De Bai Zhi Qimiao Shenghuo

title: Jiang Lu Xiao Hongjun
synopsis: The creation of this story is based on the experience and lessons of bravery, unity and friendship in the Long March of the Red Army, combined with real historical data during the Long March, combined with artistic imagination and animation creation, is a Chinese inspirational story about home, country and dream. It tells the story of the Little Red Army Wusuo, nicknamed "Donkey". He joined the Long March team and became a little warrior in the Long March because of finding his father to join the Red Army. His task is to take care of a donkey with the same nickname as him. When the team was about to start, the cooking squad unexpectedly dropped out of the team. Under the leadership of the old squad leader, the cooking squad stumbled all the way to chase the team. On the way, they also met Fugui and nurse Xiaoqing. After going through all the hardships and hardships of the Long March, in the magnificent river sand and the baptism of wind and rain, they supported each other, were funny and sad and lost. In the end, they overcame all kinds of difficulties and obstacles, chased the troops to the revolutionary base, and passed the young Long March experience. , Gained friendship and growth.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ling Ba Xue Tang
synopsis: The three exploring candy elves from Candy Planet-Scholar A Ling, Captain Aba, and Magic Engineer Gaga drove a fairy-tale spaceship "Candy" to start their journey of discovery. The first stop, Earth. This planet is magical and vast, mysterious and thrilling. Together they admired the dazzling meteor shower, and escaped the pursuit of viral assassins in the microbial world together. They were swallowed by ancient dinosaurs and rescued by animals passing by... In the thrilling adventure, they learned knowledge and harvested. Friendship. Grateful for the sharing of knowledge and the birth of friendship with the friends who have helped them!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ling Ba Xue Tang Zhi Bei Chi Diao De Chengyu Xilie
synopsis: Compared with the content plot of the first season, the second season is richer in content and more interesting. Allow viewers to explore traditional Chinese culture while watching the film. This play has changed the previous practice of explaining idioms with allusions, putting the idioms in daily life situations and showing them with humorous short stories, making the idioms easy to understand. So don’t worry about children who love to watch animation and not learn it. "Idioms Eaten" allows children to learn idioms unknowingly while watching animation, and they can also be used in life! The play also specially designed a small theater to explain the idioms that have just been learned, review the past and learn the new, and deepen the children's memory of the idioms!  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 零捌学糖之被吃掉的成语系列

title: Cong Cong Zhihui Dao
synopsis: On a happy island made up of toys, a group of funny and cute little guys live. The cheerful Congcong is a happy little yellow train. He has a group of superb friends, one called Bengbeng, who is a positive and optimistic puppet rabbit. The other is called Zaizai, a naive puppet bear. There is also Xiao Luo, a naive toy robot. Of course, there are also naughty little rhinos and little hippos who always like to get into trouble, and little shark toys that often make trouble. What Congcong and his friends do every day is to go to various places to play. They will also deliver goods to the residents of the island, help the residents solve problems and so on.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bu Fei Tongxue
synopsis: The classmates who had enjoyed a happy summer vacation returned to school. The school was reclassified in the new semester. As a result, some classmates who did not know before got together. Different personalities brought about various contradictions. A lot of interesting stories happened. In the process of learning, there are gains and losses, laughter and bitterness, and the little bit of getting along will eventually become a good memory in everyone's heart.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mofa Xiao Kuihua
synopsis: The story revolves around Hua Xiaoye and Hua Xiaorou's family and classmates. It is a small life event about family and friendship. In the story, Sunflower uses his helpful and positive values to convey to the children a healthy, safe, active lifestyle and behavior habits. Sunflower uses his magic to resolve one difficulty after another. But there were laughs and tears. Little Sunflower found what he yearned and looked for on the earth, felt the joys, sorrows and joys of life on earth, and recorded the extraordinary bits and pieces of ordinary life that he and his friends faced shoulder to shoulder.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ba Bu Xiongmao Chengyu Xilie
synopsis: The second complete episode of the Babu panda idiom series is the first parent-child education 3D cartoon in China. It has 60 episodes and each episode is about 6 minutes long. The protagonist is still based on the story characters of the complete works of Babu Panda, and the protagonist is a family of Babu Pandas who know how to fight. The story tells about the interesting things they encounter in their daily lives that are related to Chinese idioms. The characters are brought into the idiom story roles, and the profound philosophies are interpreted in humorous images.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhu Zai Yang Mei Xun Lin Ji
synopsis: Tell the story of idioms in a humorous style and exquisite painting style, allowing the children to learn more ancient history and idiom knowledge while having fun. The story takes place in the distant heavens, where there is a magical treasure called magic dragon scale. Each magic dragon scale contains a wisdom story that guards the world. And a sudden accident caused the dragon scales to be scattered in different spaces. In order to retrieve the lost magical dragon scales, twelve gods in charge of the zodiac, including Piggy and Yangmei, formed a zodiac agent team. They descended from the sky and embarked on a wonderful journey of time and space... The movie "Where is the Dragon? "The series of 2D animated long stories, the animation retains the main characters in the movie.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Q Tao Xiao Ka Xiu
synopsis: "Q Amoy Little Coffee Show" is composed of cute pet Xiao Q from Portugal star and red fox Taotao from northeast China. The red and blue CP who fell in love and killed each other, came to save the unhappy. They are sometimes dumb and silly, sometimes black-bellied spoof. A series of hilarious stories were staged in the host's home. (translated from qq)

title: Aoyun Quwen
synopsis: Gonzos in the previous Olympic Games could have made the audience smile easily, and the famous storytelling artist Zhang Shaozuo specially made speeches and dubbing for the cartoon, which has become a major feature and highlight of this cartoon. Animation’s exaggerated modeling, action, and description of storytelling images, these two elements combine, and there is tradition in fashion, and it becomes a humorous and funny TV short film.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhen Hai Baowei Zhan
synopsis: In order to protect the environment, Zhen Hai, Ning'er and their friends bravely and witly fought against the "King of the Universe" and worked with scientists to use the most advanced science and technology to protect the earth’s homeland and beautiful life, so that mankind could have A peaceful and comfortable living environment.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Guaiwu Gongyu
synopsis: A peculiar apartment, inhabited by "little monsters" from various planets. They are anticlimactic, but are enthusiastic and lost; noble and elegant, but always love snakes; by nature, they are curious, and the team's food is irresistible and leisurely; Weird little seven who always carries many mysteries; twin brothers with similar appearances but very different personalities, and the landlord Mr. P who is cold outside and hot inside. There are new things happening in the apartment every day, and the little monsters perform a different kind of "cohabitation" life. Experience the five flavors of life, reflect the reality, and make people who are busy in the city smile knowingly when watching (translated from iqiyi)

title: Guaiwu Gongyu Zhi Zhanxin Shenghuo
synopsis: The acquaintance of people lies in knowing each other, and the acquaintance of people lies in knowing the heart. With good hopes for future life, Diudiu, who left his hometown, came to the monster apartment on Monster Planet, met a group of small partners with different personalities, and started a new life belonging to him. KaKa, a cleanliness person, occasionally travels on business. The apartment becomes messy, and everyone realizes the importance of hygiene. Because things disappeared inexplicably, Diudiu suspected that there were unidentified creatures in the apartment. Later, he discovered that it was Dr. Seven, a simple scientist. Because of a meteorite rain, the two brothers KaKa and Chacha, who had originally disliked each other, also understood that brotherhood was more important than anything else. Living in this warm monster apartment, Diudiu has learned a lot, and he will continue to live like this here.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Guaiwu Gongyu Zhi Youqing Pianzhang
synopsis: Friendship is like a gorgeous chapter, adding luster to your life. Diudiu and his friends in the apartment welcomed new friends-Boban and Bozai. On a rare day off, Diudiu proposed to hold a tea party, and the theme of the tea party was "the story of the past." At the tea party, everyone recalled how they first came to the apartment, and their friendship became closer and deeper as they recalled the past and looked forward to the future. Diudiu wants to leave the monster apartment to develop a new life. Although everyone is reluctant to give up, they also wish him to get his wish. Although I want to say goodbye to everyone, in Diudiu's heart, the monster apartment is his forever home, and the little monsters will always be his best friends!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Guaiwu Gongyu Zhi Meihao Weilai
synopsis: The future is always reserved for those who struggle hard. In the last season, Diudiu left the monster apartment and went to work on a new planet. Unexpectedly, the monster apartment was notified to be remodeled. Diudiu returned to the monster apartment and led everyone to turn the apartment into a "historical street" tourist destination. Many tourists come here in particular. Mr. P develops a short-term rental business, and Miss Meizi wants to build a special theme restaurant. The friends have made suggestions. When everything was perfect, Diudiu received a work call urging him to report in. The friends are very reluctant to leave Diudiu again, but Diudiu tells everyone that he has decided not to leave and is willing to stay with everyone to create a bright future for Monster Apartment.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ci Du Chuanqi Zhi Niuniu He Niuniu
synopsis: Niuniu and Niuniu came to Dehua, the porcelain capital, and met Lin Bing, the kiln god who was worried about improving the porcelain kiln. Inspired by Niuniu and Niuniu, Lin Bing successfully built a dragon kiln and increased the output of porcelain. The robber Zongzhen stole the Linghuo porcelain beads from the dragon kiln when the ocean-going ship Hainan No. 1 was built, and the production of porcelain was blocked. With the help of Dehua girl Aci and others, Niuniu and Niuniu went through hardships and collected five kinds of raw materials to make spiritual porcelain mirrors, retrieved the Linghuo porcelain beads, drove away the bandits, and helped improve the porcelain making process. ()translated from iqiyi

details.Japanese: 瓷都传奇之牛牛和妞妞

title: Huanxiang Jia Xiao Mei
synopsis: Xiaomei, is a happy, curious, outgoing girl with excellent character and learning. Xiaomei believes that life is full of challenges. She faces everything with a smile and is full of enthusiasm. Whether she is at home, at school or in the field, she and her friends will always turn every day into an adventure. In addition to this, Xiaomei has a big secret: Aow, a cute and slightly weird fat bookworm, she hid it in a nest, in an old van in the garden. Aoao is a strange element in the series. He is a little bug, coming out of a book and living in the van of Xiaomei's house. Only the three little protagonists know him, and he is their big secret. They will not let anyone discover him. Xiaomei is responsible for it. Take care of it, protect it.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Huanxiang Jia Xiao Mei Zhi Chengzhang De Fannao
synopsis: Xiaomei, is a happy, curious, outgoing girl with excellent character and learning. Xiaomei believes that life is full of challenges. She faces everything with a smile and is full of enthusiasm. Whether she is at home, at school or in the field, she and her friends will always turn every day into an adventure. In addition to this, Xiaomei has a big secret: Aow, a cute and slightly weird fat bookworm, she hid it in a nest, in an old van in the garden. Aoao is a strange element in the series. He is a little bug, coming out of a book and living in the van of Xiaomei's house. Only the three little protagonists know him, and he is their big secret. They will not let anyone discover him. Xiaomei is responsible for it. Take care of it, protect it  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 幻想家小美之成长的烦恼

title: Miao Xingren
synopsis: On the top of Nannan Mountain, there is an ancient castle-Nannanbao, where Ah Miao and his friends live; at the bottom of the mountain is a natural stone cave-Jingjing Cave, where three mice, Ah Xing, Kuku and Doudou live. Ah Xing wanted to get the treasures of Nannan Fort. He tried all kinds of ways and tried all kinds of tactics, but every time he ended in failure, but Ah Xing never gave up. After repeated failures, he cheered up again and did not steal. Go to Caibao and swear not to stop!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bandian Xiong Yu Da Ben Zei
synopsis: On a beautiful island, the three siblings, spotted bears, dessert bears, and little bears live happily. They are optimistic, positive, love to explore, and use their brains. There are two thieves on the island, the wild boar Damao and the sack cat. They always try to destroy or steal things from the three spotted bears. So the three spotted bear brothers and the stupid thief Damao started one interesting contest after another. They used wisdom and bravery to defend their happy homeland again and again.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhihui Zhuangyuan
synopsis: In order to make Pippi, who hates mathematics, fall in love with learning, Bangbang decided to take Pippi and Cici to a place called Wisdom Manor, where people love to learn, like to think, full of wisdom, and hope to be nurtured in Wisdom Manor. Next, Pippi will love learning. But when they came to the Wisdom Manor, they found that the villagers and the environment here have changed. From an old man, they learned: After Dr. Sita arrived, the introduction of some high-tech products made everyone more and more dependent. The intelligence of the villagers of the manor slowly deteriorated.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhouyi Jinghun

title: Xiaobao Bianxing Ji
synopsis: Dad was going to alfalfa village for a scientific research project. Xiao Bao, who grew up in the city, did not want to go with him, but reluctantly agreed under the temptation of a "new laptop". After arriving at Alfalfa Village, Xiao Bao shouted that he was kidnapped, which caused misunderstanding among the villagers. After some explanations, the misunderstanding was resolved, and Xiao Bao’s life in Clover village began...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Dou Dou Yu Kuake Zhi Shenmi Pengyou
synopsis: Ami Magic Star boy Quark accidentally landed on the earth and was picked up by Doudou. The two became inseparable partners. Quark has a keen interest in all aspects of the earth, and Doudou is also amazed by the magical ability of quark. With the help of quark, Doudou, who was originally naughty but did not like to learn, experienced many small adventures and learned various knowledge, and began to become interested in science and nature; and quark was also in the process of seeking a way back home, and gradually fell in love Earth, love the time with Doudou. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 豆豆与夸克之神秘朋友

title: Rexin Qi Qi
synopsis: Qiqi worked as a little salesman selling kitchenware, but found nothing. When I entered the restaurant for dinner, I encountered a cooking competition. The kitchenware of contestant Miaomiao is broken, and Qiqi has the opportunity to show off his magic kitchenware. The last surprise is that everyone is vying to buy his kitchenware.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuang Wan Zhan Ji
synopsis: The old uncle hit the machine, bravely ventured into the pixel world alone, challenged the evil genius Dr. J, and rescued the soft girl Lori! The scene map of Chinese style elements, the reappearance of the classic game of red and white machine, the full re-engraving of the 8bit blood series characters, the adventure and passionate loli feelings in one, retrieve your youthful memories!  (translated from bilibili)

title: Xiao Xing De Zhongguo Mingzhu Zhi Lu
synopsis: The summer vacation is here, Xiaoxing and his friends want to use the vacation to learn new knowledge, they find the grandfather of the clock. The grandfather of clocks and watches took them into "Eastern Zhou Dynasty", "Taiping Guangji", "Peach Blossom Fan" and "Three Heroes and Five Righteousness" and other famous books to understand the stories.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Pan Hu Chuanqi
synopsis: It tells that the love between Panhu and Xinnu sprouts in the current Luxi area of Wuling Mountain. At that time, the Yuanshui in the Wuling Mountains was infested with white floods, causing people to live in trouble. In order to solve this threat, Panhu went through hardships to the mountains and seas where monsters infested, looking for Pangu's axe to open the sky. In the mountains and seas, Panhu and Xin Nu met. Later, the Huaxia tribe was attacked by the dog Rong tribe controlled by the wolf demon. Panhu stepped forward to help the Huaxia tribe repel the dog Rong attack. Emperor Gao Xin agreed to Panhu's request and betrothed Xin Nu to Panhu, and the two tribes married. After Panhu and Xin Nu had lived happily for many years, the wolf demon who recovered her skills sought revenge. Panhu died with the wolf demon to protect the safety of the tribe, while Xin Nu turned into a "Xin Nuyan" and waited for Panhu's return.  (translate from iqiyi)

title: Kaibutsu
synopsis: BEASTARS-themed animated music video for the song "Kaibutsu" by YOASOBI.

title: Xin Ba Gou He Ha Mi Tu
synopsis: The energetic Simba dog and the laid-back and quiet Hami rabbit, the two living treasures with different personalities, can make countless sparks happen to them in the little things, big and small things that happen in their lives.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiangyang Meng Wuyu
synopsis: Two strange little girls, Mengmeng and Fan Er, appeared in the peaceful Xiangyang city. When they were looking for the mysterious "Yuxiange", they ran into the kitchen lord Su Jili and the young man Adong, and they met because of the "Black Heart Noodle Restaurant" incident. With the stunted young Guo Guo and the technological control Kong Ming, several young people started a fantasy adventure journey under the leadership of Su Jili because of the common destination "Yu Xian Ge".  (translated from bilibili)

title: Donghua Shi Ba Bi Zhi Xiha Lou Wei Dongman
synopsis: Telling many small and interesting stories in daily life and exaggerating imagination, create a funny and humorous image of a father and son. Each episode is based on the little things in life, and the original unpretentious real life has become full of childishness and fantasy with humorous narrative techniques. The aim is to establish a positive attitude towards life by restoring the emotional exchanges between father and son in life, and achieve a bridge role in emotional transmission.  (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 动画师爸比之嘻哈楼微动漫

title: Dan Dan Long He Ta De Xiao Huobanmen
synopsis: Hi, welcome to the beautiful fairy tale world, where there are lively eggs, clever and clever rabbits, naughty naughty monkeys and honest peas bears, and our kind, intelligent and knowledgeable woodpecker Dr. Mumu. These little friends in the forest live happily and carefree every day. Although some common sense problems in life often stump them, but with the help of the knowledgeable Dr. Mumu, they have solved them time and time again. The problem, thus, has been grown and experienced.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 蛋蛋龙和他的小伙伴们

title: Mi Nuo De Zhong Er Qingchun
synopsis: Mino’s hometown is a little-known ancient town—Hidden Town. Mino went back to his hometown with his parents to study at Shengying No.1 Middle School. Since then, Minuo’s life has been completely messed up...It turns out that this is a school. At the Yokai Academy, Mino is anxious. As a normal human, how can Mino live with the Yokai? S2 Tucao Di Mino, lewd and lecherous male mouse handsome, sexy violent teacher Snake Ji...a section of funny campus ridicule story began since then.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Wai Xing Da Caoyuan
synopsis: The story tells the story of the Booming Stars of the Silver Air System, a race keen to invade other planets. The protagonist Kidd’s father is the commander of the space fleet and is not at home all year round. In order to get the attention of his father, the young Kidd proved that he had grown up and ran away from home to invade the earth. Who knew that I accidentally fell on the African savannah and became good friends with the animals on the grassland (?). Especially its "hardcore" little lion Alin. Everyone was playing happily on the prairie. Kidd’s aggressive plan is also underway today. Will it succeed? Let's wait and see! (translated from iqiyi)

title: Sai Ya Lixian Ji
synopsis: It (animation) will let people all over the country and the world understand Qinghai Lake naked carp, a second-class national protected animal and a mysterious species unique to Qinghai. The person in charge of the Haibei State Party Committee emphasized that the simple and fresh beauty and warm and timeless love conveyed by the entire cartoon, and that humans should love nature and protect limited plant and animal resources.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiongmao Xiao Rang
synopsis: An Qi, a kindergarten girl living an ordinary life in the city, moved into a new home. One day, An Qi felt a cool breeze blowing in the closet in the new room. To find out, she went into the closet and looked around. Suddenly, a channel connecting the mysterious world was discovered. An Qi, who was extremely curious, entered this passage and reached the mysterious world. In this mysterious world live the panda Xiaorang and his friends. They live a carefree, happy life there. This unexpected encounter brought a colorful and interesting experience to the originally peaceful life. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Chong Chongwu Yu
synopsis: The series of animation "Pet Talk" produced by Youchong Pictures. This animation borrows the images of cute pets such as insects, YOYO, haha, etc., vividly and interestingly popularizes scientific knowledge about pets to the majority of cute pet owners, helps the cute pet owners understand their pets better, and builds a harmonious society for pets.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Baba Bao Bao
synopsis: There are a group of happy residents living in a small town. They are all kinds of cars, including cars, tractors, motorcycles, bicycles, trucks, bulldozers... They watch and help each other, get along with each other friendly, adults work hard, and children grow up happily. . Tractor tow has two best partners, Car Huanhuan and Motorcycle Taotao. They often play together and go to school in the same class. They have endless fun and interesting things together.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: 2012 Ka Ku Chunwan Zhi Long Xing Tianxia
synopsis: The dragon clan suffered the biggest crisis in two thousand years. In order to protect the dragon clan, the wife of the dragon king decided to sacrifice herself and inject all power into the dragon clan’s weapon-dragon armor. The dragon king used the power of the dragon armor to defeat the rebels. But the dragon prince believed that the dragon king did not protect his mother, so there was always a deep grudge between him and his father. At the moment, the Dragon King has created a chance to escape for the prince, and the prince has made many friends during his adventures. In his interactions with them, the prince understands the importance of family. In the end, with the help of his friends, the prince finally succeeded in saving the dragon clan and reconciled with his father.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Tudou Xia Zhi Zhengjiu Yueliang
synopsis: chinese new year special

title: Quanzhi Fashi Q
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Ju Shu 5 Sui Hua
synopsis: An unscrupulous funny animation, some unscrupulous jokes. Uncle Ju takes you to perceive the world with a unique sense of humor! To relieve your worries and stress, be a spiritual "big health care". Irony is standard, driving is the norm. In short, 5 years old is definitely not understandable (laughs).  (translated from bilibili)

title: Jiutian Qi Yuan
synopsis: Tai Chi Island is a small island isolated from the world. Under the supervision of the lord of Longdao, the little boy fate was immersed in Chinese martial arts during the day and read and practice calligraphy at night. However, the greedy cloth tiger came here to find the legendary treasure and broke the peace of Tai Chi Island. In order to defend Taiji Island, with the help of his friends, Fate fought with Buhuo and frustrated Buhuo's conspiracy time and time again.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Da Xing Zuo
synopsis: Big star work-no funny, no entertainment! 3D scenario animation short drama is waiting for you to make together! Here are hilarious jokes with 12 constellations, laughter slots in work and life, hilarious dou albums (bi), and good contract spirit-hilarious laughter strikes every Friday~ remember! We are Daxingzuo Studio! Never knew what the constellation was, but based on a deep understanding of human nature, he forced out 12 episodes~  (translated from douban)

title: Muzi Muyu Zhenxin Hua
synopsis: "Muzi Muyu Truth" is an anime parent-child comedy for children and adults. Each episode has a topic about growth, showing a different kind of childhood, including tears, independence, freedom and dreams.  (translated from youku)

title: Guo Hun
synopsis: "The Soul of the Country" tells a group of national heroes a hundred years ago. In an era that can't bear to look back, they used their lives to write a page of heroic stories for us. [1] The manga uses objective description to tell the story of three brothers in modern Chinese history, and tells the story of modern China from the perspective of ordinary people.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiaodou Pai Pai Wenzi Wangguo Lixian Ji
synopsis: "Situational Literacy" is a series of cartoons of fairy tales that teach children to understand and understand commonly used Chinese characters. It uses the inner emotional experience of fairy tales as the main line to explain the creative style of the whole film, and appropriately adds "exaggerated and humorous" comedy elements to increase animation. The film’s fun, situational experience-based production style supplemented by appropriate humorous comedy elements, the development of fairy tales in each single episode as the open line, and the story-based situational experience as the main line to allow children to subtly understand common Chinese characters.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Meng Ji Xiaodui
synopsis: "Squad of Cute Chickens" tells the story of four cute baby chickens living together happily and growing together with other small animals under the care of their mothers. In the large remote forest, there is the largest oak tree. Under the oak tree, it is surrounded by flexible mushrooms and colorful flowers, forming a wide nature playground. This is the home of the cute chickens. The cute chicken mother Meijia is open-minded and enthusiastic, and the cute chickens are lively and cute. They helped each other, explored around, and made many new friends. They painted a fresh and childlike forest picture, allowing the children to appreciate the mysteries of nature while also learning many beautiful qualities from the cute chickens.  (translated from qq)

title: Meng Ji Xiaodui season2
synopsis: This cartoon tells the story of four baby chickens in the forest growing up happily under the care of mother chickens. In the playground of nature, there is a family of Mengji. The members are thoughtful and gentle Mika, Daewoo who is cute and shy, beautiful and lovely Duo, lively and cheerful, and Mikey who is bold and curious. During the happy hour living with Mika’s mother, the four baby chickens made friends with all kinds of small animals and insects. The whole play aims to show the life of the chickens in the forest, inspire the audience's curiosity about nature, feel and learn the good qualities of the cute, confident, curious, brave, and full of positive energy. . In the new season, let’s take a look at what new friends the little cute chickens have made, and what new and interesting stories have happened!  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Meng Ji Xiaodui season3
synopsis: It tells the story of a group of chicks with different personalities in the forest, Mai Qi, Daewoo, Duo Duo and Huan Huan, growing up healthy and happy under the care of their mother Mei Jia. In the daily life and adventure of the forest, the cute chicken team can always unlock new discoveries, learn new knowledge, recognize new animal friends, and have some funny things with them that make people laugh. With the help of Meijia's mother, she will resolve all kinds of small conflicts and grow up joyfully. An interesting story about the cute chicken squad allows the children to appreciate the beauty of nature, learn a lot of little knowledge in life, learn to observe life, discover life, and learn about the love and help between the cute chickens and their friends.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bai Bian Bu Lu Ke
synopsis: "Variable Bruco" is a 3D animation work specially created by Grape Animation for children aged 2-6. Children can learn about various vehicles and construction vehicles in the animation, and have a deep understanding of their uses, and they can also pass interesting stories The plot cultivates the qualities of active mutual assistance, solidarity and friendship.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bai Bian Bu Lu Ke season5
synopsis: Variety Bruco is a 3D animation created by Grape Animation for the growth and enlightenment of children aged 2-6. In this season, the rescue story between Bruco team and the children is still being played in the town of Pu Le. The Brooke team helped the hungry big white bear fish on the frozen river; rescued Ian who was abducted by the gorilla in the "cross-dressing party"; looked for alien meteorites with the children; and cleaned up chemical pollution. Guarding the clean water source of Pule Town... There is also a new hero-Captain Grape, who will also take on the task of fighting the bad guys and start a broader journey with the Bruco team... The Bruco team and the friends will each other Help not only gain scientific knowledge, but also understand a lot of life principles, and achieve rapid spiritual growth.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bu Lu Ke Zhandui Zhi Yuan Xing Shi Shouwei
synopsis: "The Guardian of the Star Rock of Team Bruco" is a 3D animation created by Grape Animation for the growth and enlightenment of children aged 2-6. In this season's story, Brooke's rescue story continues. This season, Bruco came to the new base and received the new mission of "Guardian Star Stone". In order to promote the execution of the task, Captain Grape gave them the ingot of innovative power. With the help of the energy of the ingot, Bru became an exclusive chariot (Boub-Crimson Lightning, Lulu-Ice Blue Warhammer, Coco- Brilliant Wings), and these tanks also have their own exclusive combat skills. After completing the upgrade of the team, Bruco united and used wisdom and courage to complete the Guardian of the Origin Star Stone. Bruker has also gained a rapid spiritual growth on his journey to become an all-around strike team.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 布鲁可战队之源星石守卫

title: Sanguo Yanyi(2017)
synopsis: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the world was in chaos and the heroes were fighting. The three kingdoms of Wei, Shu, and Wu stubbornly rose in succession, and they performed a long historical drama. The outcome of the melee of the princes formed three powerful forces: Cao Cao in the north "held the emperor in order to command the princes", and successively annihilated Yuan Shao, Yuan Shu and other forces, unified the Yellow River basin, and occupied the Central Plains; Liu Bei visited the cottage and obtained Zhuge Liang’s help from the mountains, and related Yu and Zhang Fei followed so fiercely. In the end, after the "War of Chibi", Cao Cao was forced to return to the north, and he was able to occupy Yizhou and Jingzhou and gradually develop and grow. Since Sun Jian, the Sun clan of Jiangdong took the six counties of Jiangdong as 81 counties. The base area gained a firm foothold, until Sun Quan, with increasing strength. Since then, the battle of the Three Kingdoms has started layer by layer. First, when Guan Yu and Cao Bing were at war, Sun Quan sent troops to attack Jingzhou. Guan Yu defeated Maicheng and died at the hands of Sun Quan. Later, Sun Quan established the State of Wu. Liu Bei also followed the Han Dynasty and established the Shuhan. In order to declare the enmity of Guan Yu's murder, Liu Bei personally conquered Jiangdong. As a result, the lone army went deep and defeated. Liu Bei died of illness in Baidi City, leaving Zhuge Liang alone. Soon, Cao Cao died of illness, and his son Cao Pi abolished the Han to stand on his own, and named the country "Wei". After Liu Bei's death, Zhuge Liang assisted the young master Liu Chan to support the crisis alone. In the meantime, Zhuge Liang insisted on uniting Wu against Cao, and after seven captures of Meng Huo, he stabilized the rear. Six of the Qishan defeated Wei, but all ended in failure. Zhuge Liang also became sick from overwork and died of illness. After his death, Jiang Wei succeeded in his post, successively defeated the Central Plains nine times, and returned without success. The latter lord Liu Chan was faint and incompetent, the government was corrupt, and the power of the Shu Han was gradually weakening. The Three Kingdoms era came to an end with the death of Liu Chan and Sun Haojiang. Since then, the Three Kingdoms returned to Jin  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha
synopsis: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha is set in a world where eons ago valiant heroes fought against the forces of "Destruction." While their deeds passed into legend, the power of these heroes was later inherited by "successors" who fought to protect the world. One day, Faria, a successor of the Seven Knights, saves an ordinary boy named Nemo from the forces of Destruction. During the ensuing battle, Nemo summons the power of a hero and becomes a successor as well. However, Nemo's hero is a stranger that is unknown to history, and so an epic journey where the past and present collide begins.  (Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
background: Based on the Seven Knights smartphone role-playing game by Netmarble.

title: Lost in the cruel world
synopsis: Mikasa reflects on her life, and tries to imagine what would happen if things were just a little different.
background:
Before the operation to take back Wall Maria, a Titan guillotine is seen killing Titans as Mikasa Ackermann begins to worry about Eren Jaeger. She recalls the time when she, Eren, and Armin Arlelt reminisced about the old days. Mikasa then begins to worry what Eren will do after the retaking of Wall Maria. She recalls another memory during the Struggle for Trost, when Armin informed her of Eren's death.
In shock, Mikasa experiences a different reality where her parents are alive. Inside her forest house, Dr. Jaeger brings Eren with him during a medical visit to the Ackermanns, and the two kids quickly become friends. Eren mentions to Mikasa that he will be leaving the Walls soon in a hot air balloon in order to explore the outside world, and upon reaching the place where he told her to meet him, Mikasa finds Armin alone, and he tells her of how Eren died to save him.

title: Kimetsu Gakuen: Valentine-hen
synopsis: Valentine's Day special for Kimetsu no Yaiba. The first three episodes will be released on Aniplex's official YouTube channel, while the fourth and final episode will be streamed during the Kimetsu Matsuri Online: Anime 2nd Anniversary Festival.
